item.title: Biography
item.description: Pharm Richard Asante (1978 -2024) “For if we live, we live to the Lord, and if we die, we die to the Lord. Therefore, whether we live or die, we are the Lord’s” (Romans 14:8 NKJ) Early Life and Education The late Richard Asante was born in Accra on Tuesday, 27th June, 1978 to Opanyin Kofi Safo-Asante of the Kwahu-Mpraeso Asona family and Madam Felicia Asor Sasu of the Kwahu-Mpraeso Aduana family, both of blessed memory.

item.title: Tributes
item.description: List of tributes Tribute by Wife Tribute by Children Tribute by Church Tribute by KNUST Class of 2006 Tribute by PSGH W/R Tribute by Staff of Med-Pal Tribute by Pharm Alex Badong Tribute by Pharm Kwame Antwi Tribute By Wife - Mrs Mercy Konadu-Asante “When peace like a river attendeth my way. When sorrows like seas billows roll Whatever my lot, thou hast taught me to say It is well, with my soul ” How can l write your tribute so early when life is steadily getting better?
